channel.title: Tianyu S. Ren
channel.description: Recent content on Tianyu S. Ren

item.title: About Me
item.description: function myFunction() { alert("My chinese name is 任Rén 天Tiān宇Yǔ"); } .container-fluid { padding-top: 70px; padding-bottom: 70px; } .headshot { padding-top: 70px; display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; width: 20%; animation: fadein 4s; -webkit-animation: fadein 4s; } @keyframes fadein { from { opacity:0; } to { opacity:1; } } @-webkit-keyframes fadein { /* Safari and Chrome */ from { opacity:0; } to { opacity:1; } } .video-responsive{ overflow:hidden; padding-bottom:56.

item.title: Data Science & Machine Learning
item.description: .project{ padding-top: 15px; padding-bottom: 15px; } h4 { padding-left: 20px; color: #f0a1a8; } .project a.main-nav-item { text-decoration: none; transition: color 0.3s linear; -webkit-transition: color 0.3s linear; -moz-transition: color 0.3s linear; } .project a.main-nav-item:hover { color: #ed5a65; text-decoration: none; } .main-nav-item { display: inline-block; } .title { display: table; } .fa-file-alt, h4 { display: table-cell; vertical-align: top; } .fa-terminal, p { margin-left: 40px; word-wrap: break-word; } .fa-terminal { color:#999 } .
